issue.title: [Python] pyarrow.lib.ArrowIOError when running PyTorch DataLoader in multiprocessing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2710](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2710). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Unable to open a parquet file via `pq.ParquetFile(filename)` when called using the PyTorch DataLoader in multiprocessing mode. Affects versions pyarrow > 0.7.1.

As detailed in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/1946>.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2710?focusedCommentId=16512616) by Michael Andrews (mbandrews):*
Fix suggested in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2627 does not seem to help.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2710?focusedCommentId=17392945) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Closing as out of date. Feel free to open a new JIRA with more detailed information if the issue still exists on a recent Arrow version.
